SELECT t1.CANCELFLAG, t1.CANCELINFORM, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ORIGINALWFUSERID, t1.ORIGINALWFUSERNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERDATA3, t1.USERDATA4, t1.USERDATAINFO, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFINSTANCEID, t1.WFINSTANCENAME, t1.WFLANRESTAG, t1.WFSTEPID, t1.WFSTEPLANRESTAG, t1.WFSTEPNAME, t1.WFWORKFLOWID, t1.WFWORKFLOWNAME, t1.WFWORKLISTID, t1.WFWORKLISTNAME, t1.WORKINFORM FROM T_SRFWFWORKLIST t1
